ai-tha-ap482:0.3_0: He then sat down, rooted in the seniors,
ai-tha-ap482:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
ai-tha-ap482:1.3_0: I’ve been searching for the wind;
ai-tha-ap482:2.4_0: the Holy One, the Holy One!
ai-tha-ap482:3.2_0: I drunk with the portion of poised.
ai-tha-ap482:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap482:3.4_0: and the fruit is the fruit.
ai-tha-ap482:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap482:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap482:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Paṅkadhā.
ai-tha-ap482:8.1_0: and ten senior monks from Pārāda.
ai-tha-ap482:9.1_0: The eighth sub-chapter on nakedness is finished.
